markdownRemark.html:
I have some complaints about O'Reilly's Safari Service:

  • Too much irrelevant promotion - they keep blasting me with ads for videos which I don't want!
  • Not enough content! Seems like I've read all the good stuff in the first two months...

I just checked and they allow me to hide videos from search results. Hopefully that works.

frontmatter.title: Problems with O Reilly s Safari Service
